structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIIB. CENTER FOR THE FINE ARTS

text.section:
Sec. 2-301. Preamble.
This Board of County Commissioners owns and has constructed the Center for the Fine Arts building as an integral part of the Miami-Dade Cultural Center in Miami. It is the intention of the Board of County Commissioners that the County support the operation and maintenance of the facilities of the Center, and that the programming policies and expenses for the center be determined and borne by a private nonprofit corporation.
